Please fill in all fields before adding: Please fill in all fields before adding a customer.
help_use_fields: • Use the fields at the top to enter a new customer.
help_press_add: • Press "Add" to insert the customer into the list and the database.
help_tap_customer: • Tap a customer in the list to see the details on the right.
help_press_edit: • Press "Edit" to load the selected customer into the form, modify, then press "Update".
help_press_delete: • Press "Delete" to remove the customer from the list and database.
help_copy_last_input: • "Copy Last Input" restores the fields from the previously created customer.
There is no customer in list: There is no customer in list
Please select a customer from the list: Please select a customer from the list
Are you sure you want to delete: Are you sure you want to delete
select_car_from_list: Select a car from the list
confirm_delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete this car?
new_car_content: How do you want to start?
confirm_save_content: Do you want to save this car?
copy_previous_boat_message: Do you want to start with the values from the last boat you added?
instructions_message: Use the Add button to create a new boat listing. Tap an existing boat to view and edit its details. Long-press or use buttons on the details page to update or delete.
copyprev_msg: Do you want to copy the fields from the last created offer, or start with an empty form?
delete_offer_msg: Are you sure you want to delete this offer?
offers_help_body:
• Tap the + button to create a new offer.
• Tap an existing offer to edit or delete it.
• Offers are saved in the database and reloaded on restart.
form_help_body:
• Fill all fields to create a new offer.
• Tap the calendar icon to choose a date.
• Use the switch to mark offer as accepted.
• In edit mode, tap the trash icon to delete.
